curve_phrases: May the Curve be with you.
Say hello to my little Curve!
We're going to need a bigger Curve.
Life is like a box of Curves.
What we've got here is failure to Curve.
The Curve rule of Fight Club is: You do not talk about Fight Club.
We will, we will Curve you.
Curve me baby one more time.
Sweet dreams are made of Curves.
What doesn't Curve you makes you stronger.
To Curve or not to Curve, that is the question.
With great Curve comes great responsibility.
It was the best of Curves, it was the worst of Curves.
The only thing we have to fear is the Curve itself.
Ask not what your Curve can do for you.
All Curves are equal, but some are more equal than others.
A Curve of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
The quick Curving fox jumps over the lazy dog.
Get busy Curving, or get busy dying.
